content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Iron plate production at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Small electric pole (position x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Lab at position(x= unknown)
Consists of lab with no power and no input

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the entities are compatible with each other and can be connected.
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the burner mining drills to avoid them running out of fuel.
### Errors when using furnaces
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to the furnaces to avoid them having no ingredients to smelt.
### Errors when using boilers
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the boilers to avoid them running out of fuel.
### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Make sure to connect the offshore pump to a pipe to avoid it not working properly.
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Make sure to provide input liquid to the steam engine to avoid it not working properly.
